code: import"./App.css";import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[result,setResult]=useState();const[value,setValue]=useState();const[apiResult,setApiResult]=useState();function countAndChangeState(){const resultValue=count(value);setResult(resultValue);}const handleInputChange=e=>{setValue(e.target.value);};function count(number){return 2*number;}const getKanbanCardByPhaseId=id=>{const response=fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/kanbancard/phase/".concat(id),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"application/json, text/plain","Content-type":"application/json"}}).then(res=>{return res.json();});setApiResult(response);console.log(response);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:["number:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:countAndChangeState,children:"Press me to calculate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:result,readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>getKanbanCardByPhaseId(1),children:"Api Call"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:apiResult,readOnly:true})]});}export default App;
